title: Alarm rings without any set, when dnd is off.
content: I use to have an alarm for every weekday at 630am, but i recently removed it, and my alarm still goes off without fail, and im not able to shut it off short of a restart. i only noticed that it would stop ringing if i put do not disturb on and took alarms off exceptions. i have tried clearing and disabling the clock app, but it does nothing. im close to throwing my phone at the wall every morning please help
